bibl.title: J.W. Tripp v. Territory of Washington. Subpoena
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Jefferson County Third Judicial District Court

body.p: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON } ss THIRD JUDICIAL DISTRICT
To the Sheriff of Jefferson County, Greeting:

In the name of the United States of America you are hereby commanded to subpoena John X Appleton, D.W.C. Dennison, J.D. Spurlock, Walter X Beal, Peter X Flanagan, Thomas X Stratton J.G. Clinger, + Bard X Stream

to be and appear forthwith before the Judge of the United States District Court for the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, now in session at at the Court House in Port Townsend for the District aforesaid, then and there to give evidence in a cause therein pending, wherein the Territory of Washington is Plaintiff, and _____ J.W. Tripp is Defendant.
WITNESS the Honorable Charles B. Darwin, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court and Judge of the Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, this 5th day of June A.D. 1867
Territory of Washington vs. J.W. Tripp
Served the within by supeoning the named William this 6 day of June 1867
J.H Woodly Sheriff of Jefferson County
